Samsung

Samsung Knox is a combination of a proven security foundation built into Samsung devices, and a mature suite of business solutions leveraging this platform, Secured by Knox.

As the lead designer for our Samsung Knox portals and various NDA projects, my work includes:

  • Overseeing the continual improvement of the Samsung Knox portals/products based on user feedback, design trends, and site performance while ensuring the Samsung brand is on point.
  • Development of a design system to improve design consistency and efficency.
  • Executing an iterative design thinking process, which involves taking concepts from ideation to handoff of MVP ready prototypes.
  • Visual design of iconography, pictograms and illustrations.
  • Collaboration with our UX teams and stakeholders to propose and design innovative solutions informed by user research, feedback and data.

Sample illustrations created for our Knox Partner Portal
